member.name: T:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for ContinuousListener.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.SampleRate
member.summary: Audio sample rate in Hz. Default: 16000.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.VadChunkMs
member.summary: VAD chunk size in milliseconds. Default: 32ms.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.PreBufferMs
member.summary: Pre-buffer duration in milliseconds. Default: 1000ms.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.PostSilenceMs
member.summary: Post-silence duration to end recording in milliseconds. Default: 1500ms. With LLM Router, we wait longer to capture complete utterances.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.MinRecordingMs
member.summary: Minimum recording duration in milliseconds. Default: 800ms.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.SileroVadModelPath
member.summary: Path to Silero VAD ONNX model file (relative to application directory). MUST be configured in appsettings.json.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.WhisperModelPath
member.summary: Path to Whisper model file for transcription (relative to application directory). MUST be configured in appsettings.json.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.WhisperLanguage
member.summary: Language for Whisper transcription.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.MaxSegmentMs
member.summary: Maximum audio segment duration for transcription in milliseconds. Default: 60000ms (60 seconds). Longer audio will be truncated to prevent Whisper.net issues.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.AudioSource
member.summary: PipeWire audio source to capture from. If set, uses the specified source (e.g., "virtual-assistant-aec-source" for echo cancellation). If null/empty, uses the default microphone.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.LogViewerPort
member.summary: Port for Logdy log viewer. Default: 5053.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.KeyboardDevice
member.summary: Path to keyboard device for ScrollLock mute toggle. If null/empty, auto-detects keyboard.

member.name: P:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Configuration.ContinuousListenerOptions.StartMuted
member.summary: Whether the assistant should start in muted mode. Default: true. When true, user must explicitly unmute (ScrollLock) to begin voice interaction.

member.summary: Ignore the input.

member.summary: Command - action to be executed (Build mode).

member.summary: Question - query to be answered (Plan mode).

member.summary: Confirmation - confirmation of an action (Build mode).

member.summary: Continuation - request to continue previous action (Build mode).

member.param: Agent to use: "plan" for questions/discussions, "build" for commands.
member.returns: True if message was sent successfully, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Utilities.RateLimitParser
member.summary: Utility for parsing rate limit information from error messages.

member.name: M:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Utilities.RateLimitParser.ParseResetTimeFromError(System.String)
member.summary: Parses reset time from rate limit error message.
member.returns: DateTime when rate limit resets, or null if not parseable

member.name: M:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Utilities.RateLimitParser.MinutesSecondsRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
try again in (\\d+)m([\\d.]+)s
Explanation:
○ Match the string "try again in ".
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least once.
○ Match 'm'.
○ 2nd capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [.\d] atomically at least once.
○ Match 's'.

member.name: M:Olbrasoft.VirtualAssistant.Core.Utilities.RateLimitParser.SecondsOnlyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
try again in ([\\d.]+)s
Explanation:
○ Match the string "try again in ".
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [.\d] atomically at least once.
○ Match 's'.

member.name: T:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.IHumanizationService
member.summary: Service for humanizing agent notifications using LLM. Transforms raw agent messages into natural Czech speech.
Humanizes a batch of agent notifications into natural Czech speech.
member.param: Optional Czech summaries of related GitHub issues (issue number -> summary info)
member.returns: Humanized text for TTS, or null if no notification needed

member.summary: Summary information for a GitHub issue used in humanization.

member.summary: Czech summary of the issue.

member.summary: Whether the issue is open.

member.summary: Represents an agent notification to be humanized.

member.name: T:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.INotificationBatchingService
member.summary: Service for batching agent notifications before humanization. Collects notifications over a short time window to combine related messages. Messages are queued and played sequentially - no interruption between agents.

member.name: M:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.INotificationBatchingService.QueueNotification(VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.AgentNotification)
member.summary: Queues a notification for batching. The notification will be humanized and spoken after the batch window expires. If a batch is currently being processed, the notification waits in queue.

member.name: P:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.INotificationBatchingService.PendingCount
member.summary: Gets the current batch size (for monitoring/testing).

member.name: P:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.INotificationBatchingService.IsProcessing
member.summary: Whether a batch is currently being processed (humanization + TTS).

member.name: M:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.INotificationBatchingService.FlushAsync
member.summary: Immediately processes any pending notifications without waiting for the batch timer. Used when speech lock is released to play queued messages right away.
member.returns: Task that completes when the batch has been processed.

member.name: T:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.INotificationService
member.summary: Service for managing notifications in the database.

member.param: Agent name (e.g., "opencode", "claude") - will be looked up in database
Optional GitHub issue IDs to associate with this notification

member.summary: Gets all notifications with NewlyReceived status.

member.name: T:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.IVirtualAssistantSpeaker
member.summary: Single entry point for all TTS operations in VirtualAssistant. All components must use this interface for speaking - nobody injects ITtsService directly. Supports speech cancellation for interruption scenarios.

member.name: P:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.IVirtualAssistantSpeaker.IsSpeaking
member.summary: Whether speech is currently playing.

member.name: P:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.IVirtualAssistantSpeaker.QueueCount
member.summary: Number of messages waiting in TTS queue.

member.name: M:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.IVirtualAssistantSpeaker.SpeakAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Speaks the text using TTS. If agentName is provided, checks workspace and skips TTS if user is on same workspace as agent.
member.param: Optional agent name for workspace detection (e.g., "opencode", "claude")
If true, bypasses TTS cache and always generates fresh audio (use for notifications with dynamic content)

member.name: M:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.IVirtualAssistantSpeaker.CancelCurrentSpeech
member.summary: Cancels currently playing speech. Next item in queue will start playing.

member.name: M:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.IVirtualAssistantSpeaker.CancelAllSpeech
member.summary: Cancels all speech and clears the queue.

member.name: M:VirtualAssistant.Core.Services.IVirtualAssistantSpeaker.FlushQueueAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Plays all queued messages immediately. Called when speech lock is released to flush pending messages.
